name: VR Horror: The Halloween Room
description:
Let's truly scare yourself this Halloween! The latest Virtual Reality horror game - The Halloween Room will bring you thrilling and nerve cracking fear.

The Story:
A group of your friends setups a halloween party in a remote cemetery to challenge the fear of scary night.
The challenge turns reality when you and 2 friends lost in an old farm house with a hidden hospital labs.
Most doors are closed, two are dead by a half human muscle mutant. Your only last chance is to escape & find the last door.

Wearing your VR headset and enjoy full of real horror effects. What you will get?

+ Overwhelming threatended and exciting
+ Immersive Virtual Reality experience
+ 360-degree view
+ High quality graphics
+ 3D scary sound

This app surely contains many creepy things like blood, screaming, horror laughter...

Congratulation if you can survive and finish this terrifying tour!

Explore more interesting VR movie and apps with Vulcan Labs.

Let's keep playing!
